channel.title: Structures on NOSTRUGGLE
channel.description: Recent content in Structures on NOSTRUGGLE

item.title: Create New Endpoint
item.description: Model The model will contain the definition of the mongoose schema that represents the document on MongoDB models/user.model.js Controller Controllers will contain the functions that handle the various request methods for the endpoint. controller/users.js Routes and Index.js The routers will route the endpoints for a specific api. It will be appended to the server’s baseURL found it .env and the api path defined in the server’s index.js file. index.js app.use() tells the app to run the routes/users.
